Talk_21: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey! It's the guy who fixed our house!
Talk_56:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Huh? You don't have it... Did you lose
it somewhere?
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>It's Dad's favorite thing.<sp:0:4:0>He loves it so much, he put it in an
<clr:0000>iron chest<clr:ffff> so nobody'd take it.<sp:0:4:0>But I checked everywhere, and I couldn't
find the chest.<sp:0:4:0>I think those pirates sank it. So it's
probably in the bay, since it's too heavy
to float away.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>Dad's pretending like he doesn't mind,
but I bet he's really sad it's gone.<sp:0:4:0>I gotta get it back!
Talk_58:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>No more time to hunt treasure today.<sp:5:0:0>
Let's try again tomorrow!

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>That <clr:0000>treasure chest <clr:ffff>sure is hard to find.<sp:5:0:0>
It must have sunk really deep.
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Yeah, let's play some other time!


<sp:3:0:2:0a01>After I find that shirt...
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>That color... <sp:5:1:0>That smell that sticks in
my nose!<sp:0:4:0>There's no mistaking it! This is Dad's
blue shirt!
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>And you! Rebuilding houses, finding
lost shirts...<sp:0:4:0>What can't you do?
Talk_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>And you! Saving villages, finding
lost items...

What can't you do?
Talk_42: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Hiii! Did you have a good day, savior guy?
Talk_43:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hey, you're the guy who fixed our house
when it broke!

Um... <sp:5:1:0>Thank youuu!
Talk_44:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hey, you're the guy who fixed our house
and our village and stuff! <sp:5:0:0>The savior guy!

Um... <sp:5:1:0>Thank youuu!
Talk_45:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I thought this'd be a good time to look.
Y'know, morning, when the water's all
sparkly and see-through...
Talk_46:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I was hoping the sun would make it easier
to spot... Weird!
Talk_47:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I was sure I'd find it today, but I ran out
of time. Gotta eat dinner.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Where's that <clr:0000>iron chest <clr:ffff>with Dad's
<clr:0000>blue shirt<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>It's heavy, so if it sank in the ocean,
it should still be <clr:0000>in the bay <clr:ffff>somewhere.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>Dad's pretending like he doesn't mind,
but I bet he's really sad it's gone.<sp:0:4:0>I gotta get it back!
Talk_48:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>That <clr:0000>blue shirt <clr:ffff>smells like my dad! That's
my dad's shirt!
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Whaaa? But, Dad, weren't you sad about
your shirt?
Talk_49:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Yay! You took off my dad's <clr:0000>blue shirt<clr:ffff>!


Dad loved that shirt... He'll be so glad to
have it back!
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You wanna practice ocean-walking
with me?<sp:0:4:0>Then you and me and my big brother,
Zuta, can go look for the <clr:0000>blue treasure
chest<clr:ffff> with the <clr:0000>iron shirt<clr:ffff>!
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Y'know, mister, everyone's calling you
the savior of our village!<sp:0:4:0>Thanks for putting everything back how it
used to be.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>My mom and dad said to say thanks if
I saw you.
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Huh? You smell like my dad, mister!


Maybe you... <sp:5:0:0>Did you find my dad's
<clr:0000>blue shirt<clr:ffff>?<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>My trusty blue shirt... <sp:5:0:0>When I was a
young man, I used to wear it all the time.

But I haven't put it on since the boys'
mom started picking out my clothes.

Seems a shame to keep that beauty in a
moldy old chest though... <sp:5:0:0>Say, would you
want it?
Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Well, yeah... The one I'm wearing! I was
eating soup, and I got a big stain on it.

I thought it was ruined.


<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>But then Mommy got rid of the stain,
so it's good as new!
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>Afraid so, kiddo.<sp:5:2:0> But I am grateful you did
all that for your old man!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Honestly, I can't believe how fast you
two are growing up.

<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Scare_01>You make your dad proud, you know that?<sp:5:0:0>
Very, very proud.
Talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>After the pirates tore down our house,
we had to go live in a tent.

It was actually kinda fun—like having a
secret base! But I'm waaay happier now
we're back home.
Talk_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I wish I could search for it now, but I gotta
go to bed. Tomorrow, I guess...
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Sorry, mister, but I can't play right now.
I gotta find my dad's <clr:0000>blue shirt<clr:ffff>...
Talk_37: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Hiii! How was your day, house-fixer guy?
Talk_02: <sp:3:0:2:0a00>Sorry... I can't play right now.<sp:0:4:0>I've got to find Dad's <clr:0000>blue shirt<clr:ffff>.
Talk_38: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>What did you think? Pretty good, huh?
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm learning how to walk on the ocean!
It's hard!<sp:0:4:0>But, but...my big brother and I are trying
to find sunken treasure.<sp:0:4:0>It's a <clr:0000>blue treasure chest<clr:ffff> with an <clr:0000>iron
shirt <clr:ffff>in it!<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_50:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Huh... You're wearing <sp:5:0:0>a <clr:0000>blue shirt<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:4:0>Too bad! My brother, Zuta, is looking for
an iron shirt! That's not iron!
Talk_39:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_01>Oh, so...all this time, we were worried
about the wrong shirt?
Talk_51:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh! That blue shirt... It looks just like one
I used to wear.
Talk_52: <sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>Thank you, mister! I gotta go tell my dad!
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Being in a tent was kinda fun—like having
a secret base! But I'm waaay happier now
we're back home.
Talk_08: <sp:3:0:2:0801>I met you at the Skyview Tower!
Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>And can you take it off, please? My dad
needs it back!
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_00>So that's what you two were doing on
the beach all day—looking for this?
I thought you were out playing!<sp:0:4:0>Gosh. Thanks for finding this, guys.
